alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 2:13PM CDT until March 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning tonight, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the Freeze Warning Sunday night, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Perry and Greene Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 4 AM to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 10 PM Sunday to 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
